channel.title: Nvidia Inspector
channel.description: So I'm trying to use Nvidia Inspector to force AA in Crysis 2 but it doesn't seem to work. I'm using a string that I found in a thread about the tool and did what they said but it's still not working. Is it caused because I'm playing in DX11 mode instead of DX9? I thought that DX11 had better AA compatibility that DX9 did. So yeah, could anyone that knows how to use this program help? I'm trying to use SGSSAA.

item.title: Nvidia Inspector
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
I could try but not sure if it’ll work or not if people are resorting to Inspector.

Read full topic
